text.title: part3_Wikinews interviews Mark Bunker, producer of anti-Scientology website 'XenuTV'

s.hi: Do they actually run camps associated with that ?

p.s: : R2-45 camps ?
Never heard of it .
DM loves guns but there 's no camps for shooting .

hi.s: What is the next step we should take in raising the general public 's awareness of the atrocities of the " Church " of Scientology .
Also , besides www.xenutv.com , what are some other , reputable , citable sources of information on these abuses ?

p.s: There are plenty of great sites starting with the granddaddy of them all — www.xenu.net .
Professor David Touretzky 's various sites are well researched and important resources .
and such .

My favorite book on Scientology is
Bare-Faced Messiah
.
It and many others can now be read on the web .
I 'd like to do audiobook versions of them for people to download .
Where , oh where , is the time , however .

s.hi: Why does Scientology accuse people of crimes when they are asked questions ?

p.s: Hubbard put it into writing .
" Always attack - Never defend .
" There are policy letters where he ordered people never to answer questions about Scientology but instead twist it around to the crimes of the critic .
So when you see that happening in my videos , you are hearing Hubbard 's words come through the Scientologist 's mouth , which is one of the reasons I never get mad at them .
This is what they are taught .
They literally ca n't think for themselves .

hi.s: Why do you think Scientology dangerous ?
From a European ( French ) point of view there are many strange organizations in the United States ( Nazi party , many religious groups ) .

p.s: I think Scientology is dangerous to individuals who find their realities stripped .
I think it 's dangerous to families when they are broken up by disconnection .
I think it 's dangerous to society when they write laws that our politicians back to attack psychiatry .
Anytime they stop free speech , I think that 's bad in general .
Scientology is my fight because others were too afraid to take them on .
I hate bullies .
Scientology ( while dangerous ) acts like a big school yard bully .
Now if that bully in 4th grade had a crack legal team and a gang of devoted followers who would do dirty tricks to send you to jail , a mental ward or the grave -- he would have been a real threat !
Scientology also brings together my general interest in cults , sci-fi and Hollywood in a unique way .
I never expected to pick a fight with a dangerous cult but someone had to stand up to them .
I thought I could help .

s.hi: And that 's part of the reasons you support ' Anonymous ' and — apart from DDoS — their actions ?
